scene.name: intro
scene.line: Huh. Who do you suppose set this up?
scene.option: Maybe they're running out of bunks.

scene.name: crowded
scene.line: I wonder what the turnover's like here. It sounds like people end up staying for a while ...

scene.name: leave
scene.line: Listen, there's something ... I don't like this place. I don't trust this guy showing us around. Let's get the information we need and move on as soon as we can.
